snippet: Thai police said Saturday that they have arrested a key anti-government protest leader and charged him with offenses including insurrection, risking further political confrontations even though a court freed him on bail hours later....

headline.print_headline: Thai Protest Leader Arrested on Several Charges
headline.main: Thai Protest Leader Arrested on Several Charges

lead_paragraph: Thai police said Saturday that they have arrested a key anti-government protest leader and charged him with offenses including insurrection, risking further political confrontations even though a court freed him on bail hours later.
